name: Mega Man Battle Network 5: Double Team DS
name_original: Mega Man Battle Network 5: Double Team DS
description:
Mega Man Battle Network 5: Double Team DS is a RPG video game published by Capcom released on November 1st, 2005 for the DS.
In the game, you can join forces with characters from previous installments of the Mega Man Battle series, and you can play in a new fighting mode. Team up with other cyberheroes in an effort to stop an evil organization from taking control of the global Internet.
